website_summaries.verdict: Popular peach-scented foot peels that have quality ingredients and a lovely aroma.
pros: Softens calluses and dry skin while leaving a light peach scent
Contains plant botanicals and vitamins that nourish skin
You get two pairs for the price
cons: Somewhat messy, as the packages contain quite a bit of liquid
May not produce noticeable results for all users

customer_reviews.title: Oh. My. Goodness.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this type of foot mask before but I’ve never gotten results like this. It’s AMAZING!!!! Pro tip: use a really thick moisturizer on your feet every day before you start peeling. It makes the skin come off in sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Proton

customer_reviews.title: I’m not so much into reviews, but this product needs to have more reviews!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fun of home pedi! I do it once a month and every time I use this foot peeling mask. It does 70% of the job, I just need to do my nails and voila. I tried so many masks before, but I prefer this one. It’s not too harsh, the smell is very pleasant and if I have any question, the customer service always answer quickly and nicely. I asked them how to wear the mask and they sent me the video that I uploaded. I found it very useful and decided to share with you, hope it helps :)
customer_reviews.author: Raluca B

customer_reviews.title: not as good as my last time with another brand
customer_reviews.text: Compared to another brand(babyfeet) I was not happy with the results I got. It took a long time to finally start to peel and once it did i do not feel like it did much. I was hopeful this would work.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Rose

customer_reviews.title: Holy s***
customer_reviews.text: Omgsh 7days later this pic was taking the skin coming off is thick ahhhh scared my kids. Safe to say this actually works
customer_reviews.author: Calli joe

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to see results, but the baby feet are worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This has been quite a process, but I can finally see the results now and they were worth waiting for! Be ready for A LOT of shedding, soak your feet in warm water as often as you can to expedite the peeling and be prepared to wear closed shoes for a few days!! I will use this mask again in the future and I plan to give a few as gifts to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Alina N.

customer_reviews.title: Causes painful chemical burns
customer_reviews.text: Warning: causes chemical burns. I used this product a few weeks ago and am still recovering from it. My feet are in tremendous pain and I have had to wear shoes that cover my feet in the heat. I highly regret purchasing this and even more so using it.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Great results with this Foot Peeling Mask
customer_reviews.text: Great product that gives you the best results! Used it as instructed and on day 6 my feet were like snake :)) I actually enjoyed the process. I recommend to soak the feet in warm water as much as possible, that’s how I saw bigger results. What I liked about this mask is that the stickers keep the mask in place really well. Tried other brands before, but I had to use tape after 30 mins of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Know your risks before you buy it
customer_reviews.text: I guess the only reason I would buy it again is if I had super thick calluses. 1. It's easy to use 2. The skin does come off. But a week or so later. 3. My feet were not that bad before, I just wanted that smooth and soft feeling. But now a month later my feet are still peeling, super dry and look like 90 year old's feet ( nothing against it but not in my 20th) Also, according to my dermatologist, these peels are not good to get unless you have an actual need for it, since you're becoming more prone to different feet infection and fungi.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pay the extra $2 for a product that you know works
customer_reviews.text: I have used these foot mask before, but not this brand. I purchased this product because it was about $2 less than the brand I used before. 7 days ago, I followed the instructions/video, and I'm still waiting for signs of peeling. Nothing yet! Moral of the story, pay the extra $2 for a product you know works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Product cause feet itchy
customer_reviews.text: I this this is a wrong choice. Product cause my both feet itchy the second day. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Keast

customer_reviews.title: didn't see anything after application
customer_reviews.text: Today is on my day 10, and I believe nothing will take place. I applied it as directed and until now (day 10) I didn't see even tiny changes. Simply not working.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of awful reactions after use
customer_reviews.text: I used the foot peel following every step of the instruction. A week later, my feet have awful blisters all over the edge of the new skin after the peeling of old skin and I had to go see a doctor who diagnosed me having dermatitis! I would like to get a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Hang Lin

customer_reviews.title: product not working
customer_reviews.text: I applied it as directed and wait for about a week and didn't see anything happens. I saw a lot of good reviews, but I think this product is not for everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gall

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely works
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. At this price, I was skeptical. But, hey, it's just a few bucks wasted if it didn't work. Followed directions. 5 days later, my feet were molting. Still peeling and I am on day 10. Definitely could not use in the summer. Would not be able to wear flip flops without scaring small children (and grown men). Feet are dry feeling while wearing socks, and I did use lotion one day. I have found my "cheap" pedicure, and I WILL buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective peel!
customer_reviews.text: Having previously used other brands of foot peels, I can forthrightly say that this one worked as well as if not better than its competitors. The peach scent was pleasant and not overpowering, the "booties" easy to apply with the included strips of adhesive tape. I do recommend (as they do) wearing real socks over the booties which maximizes contact with the solution AND also the results! More than with any other similar product, I was impressed with how my heels especially peeled in large and easy pieces in only a week! I'd surely recommend this product and will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Michele B.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great experience- didn't really do anything.
customer_reviews.text: I have used a couple of other foot masks in the past. Unfortunately, my favorite mask is no longer available on Amazon. This was my least favorite. It peeled a little and then it stopped. I eventually had to use the second pack, since the first one really didn't do anything. It was just a waste of time and money. Neither mask led to any significant results. My feet were better off before using it. They looked better and were smoother before. I can't wait until enough time has passed by to try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing experience
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I give this product 5 stars. also, if you could leave a seller review, that would be awesome! The product arrived on time and the seller sent me a really cute thank you email. I work on my feet, and I needed the product that would help me feel well. After trying couple others before and comparing them to this one.Thank you! Will be ordering again;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soak your feet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It definitely makes your feet peel quite a bit. The smell is very strong and I found it slightly off putting, but not enough to keep me from using the peel again. After you use the peel, you have to make sure that you soak your feet for a bit each day to really get a good peel going. My feet really do look much better than they did before and I will probably buy this again next winter when they start to get bad again.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Cat

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: 11 years and 2 babies later, my feet were extremely neglected. Cracking, peeling, opening into painful splits, my tootsies were a mess. Then I headed to Amazon to find one of those foot mask thingys everyone was talking about. I stumbled upon this product and it just caught my eye. The reviews were positive so I thought I'd give it a try! I am so VERY glad I did. My feet are now very smooth and the peeling process was kinda fun! I'm glad it comes with 2 pairs of booties because the super hard callouses on my heels need a little more TLC. That is the only reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars!! Great product! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: M Robin

customer_reviews.title: Yikes
customer_reviews.text: I just got finished with the mask/took the “socks” off and yikes...i don’t have a super sensitive skin nor do I have allergies but these made me feel not well!! My feet were kind of burning, I got a weird feeling in my tummy and an odd taste in the back of my throat..call me crazy but it started soon after I put these booties on. I could barely keep them on for an hour because I just had to get them off my feet. Will see how the next two weeks go but I’m definitely scared to use anything like this ever again.
customer_reviews.author: AliseinStyle

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as good as BAby Feet
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase Baby Feet brand with excellent results. Saw the reviews for this product and the price was great, but the results no so great. Prep, application and wait time were basically the same as Baby Feet, but the results were dismal. Where usually chucks of skin come off if had less peeling that you’d have with a minor sunburn. Very disappointed. Will try the second one back to back and see if any better, if not I’ll go back to Baby Feet
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: So gross but soooooo good!
customer_reviews.text: Oh. My. Word. I didn't know what to expect, there were definitely mixed reviews. These are amazing! I left them on my feet for 90 minutes, watched a movie and just relaxed. Then I made sure to fill the tub so my feet would soak every time I took a shower.... in about a week, there were gross, giant flakes of skin coming off. My feet truly benefitted from these and I will use the other package again soon to remove the rest of the grossness! Well worth the money. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E.

customer_reviews.title: Makes Your Feet Smooth
customer_reviews.text: These foot peel masks are great for people who want smooth, feet. They effectively smoothed out a bunch of callouses I had, and made my feet smell like a Fuzzy Navel as a bonus! The downside is that it can take a bit. It’s not something you want to do the day before going to the beach, as you’ll have dead skin coming off your feet for at least a few days. Plus, if you’re not diligent about exfoliating you’re feet are going to itch as the skin peels off over time. So, works exactly as advertised, but it’s maybe not something I’d recommend for a relaxing experience. It’s a bit different from a face-peel or mask.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Jo

customer_reviews.title: Dont bug read review dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: This product will give you chemical burns. I followed the directs. Left on for 30 minutes because my feet burned sooo very badly. I do not have any health issues and my feet were free of wounds. My feet are still having issues healing my skin is extreamly tough and unable to shed the skin. I soak my feet every night since the day I was able to according to the packages instructions. This is a horrible product. Do not buy it. Choose another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney W.

customer_reviews.title: Routine that my mom used and my grandma used and it seem to work.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this and I did read the directions and I did realize that the skin comes off slowly. What I didn’t realize is that it came off really slowly so my feet were flaking for weeks and that wasn’t what I was looking for. Also it didn’t have the effect on the big dry cracks that I have. I have also tried a wax treatment and that didn’t work. I’m going to go back to my old fashion file Routine that my mom used and my grandma used and it seem to work.
customer_reviews.author: Karis

customer_reviews.title: I don't like this product
customer_reviews.text: It made my feet very sensitive. this made my very uncomfortable. And this product does peel the skin, but it takes 2 week to finish it which makes the 2 week mess everywhere. I definitely won't use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wood

customer_reviews.title: This foot mask rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I get pedicure 1-2 times a month, I never got such a result. The peeling is gross but totally worth it. I couldn’t believe how much skin peeled off and it is still soft after few weeks. The best combination is to use the mask and a moisturizing cream after that. I will definitely use this mask again.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this, works as advertised! I was told I have tough skin on my feet and after this it's definitely softer. Simple to use - put on your feet, put some socks, forget about it for 1-2 hours, then take it off. After some time you'll see your old dead skin start to peel away and your feet will be much, much softer. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rafal Szymanski

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: There are so many good reviews about this product that I decided to give it a try. It’s Ben 10 days and only the very thin and soft parts of my feet have peeled, but the skin around the bottoms of my toes and on my heels continue to stay. I’m left with a very patchy and ugly feet. I most definitely won’t be buying this product again
customer_reviews.author: Monika Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance but not very effective
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy's size 9 and for the package they should have fit but they barely did. Other brands have plastic that travel a little ways up to ankle where these did not even after putting socks on over them they still kept slipping around regardless of using the peel and stick attachments. I tried the first pair and besides a little itching nothing happened I tried the second pair and there was a little peeling I even follow the instructions to soak my feet 20 minutes each day to assist with the process but these were not very effective. Other people may have success where I did not.
customer_reviews.author: Technorocker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome overall
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been obsessed with foot peels lately and this is my fave so far. I used it 2 days ago and my feet have started to peel, prompting me to post this review. I love the smell of the liquid in the booties, smells like fruit! Also I have giant feet, size 10-11 womens, and these fit my feet and could def fit somebody with even bigger feet too. Plus the price of these is awesome and it has 2 pairs which is great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Works good 👌👌
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this for me and my mom and it definitely works our feet started to peel around the 4-5 day mark after doing the feet mask. It is now the 10th day after using the mask and our feet are still peeling but it’s definitely all worth it in the end because the parts that have already peeled on my feet are now very smooth. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Edwards

customer_reviews.title: YAAASSSS!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this product. A few years ago, I contracted a really bad fungus from a nail salon and finally last year it has fully cleared up. The fungus did a number on my skin not just my toes so much so that no foot scrubs weren't enough even the electric callus remover didn't help. This product really helped to bring my feet back to life. I cannot wait to wear sandals this spring and summer. I will definitely buy again and recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shaela

customer_reviews.title: Loved these until... ouch!
customer_reviews.text: So these were extremely easy to use and I loved it after the first mask. The smell is amazing, I love how easy it is to use. But it says on the package to apply the second mask 5-7 days after the first application- which already had my feet peeling like crazy... but I did what it said and it gave me crazy chemical burns all over my feet. It’s extremely itchy and I’m in a lot of pain now. I’m still pleased with how much dry skin and callus the first mask removed, but they shouldn’t encourage a second one so soon after your feet peeling from the first one!
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie Harrington

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted to get rid of my rough skin on my feet but wasn't sure how. I have tried creams, pumice, and even a foot dremmel. None of it worked. I picked this specific brand beacuase there were lots of positive reviews and it is affordable. My feet started to peel 2 days after using the product. Overall, my feet have peeled almost entirely. I left the booties on for 60 min. Today I am going to use the second pair of booties because my feel are super calloused. I am glad the pack comes with two pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marie

customer_reviews.title: Chemical burn?
customer_reviews.text: So I just got these in and I tried them and I'm pretty disappointed. I was excited, too, because the reviews are great!......... Not only did the liquid from the booties/socks overflow as soon as I put a sock on over, the tops of my feet started burning after about 30 minutes and now I have a chemical burn on the back of my ankle. We'll see how well this works as a peel, but I can safely say I am unlikely to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Stern

customer_reviews.title: Smooth feet
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this foot peel mask. My feet are in heaven. I like everything about this foot mask. My feet are soft and ready for summer. My feet are soft and smooth after using this. I could see the dead skin coming right off. The relaxation I felt in my feet while I was wearing it was so nice. The stuff that has come off my feet during this process has been unreal. to think that was on my feet. I will get this peel again and I plan on getting my daughter some as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell kneece

customer_reviews.title: Works but messy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this foot mask more stars if the booties where actually more like a boot and less like trying to put a canoe on your feet.. It works well enough but difficult to put on without spilling the liquid on the floor which makes a mess to clean up. They need to taper just a little more around the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mordue

customer_reviews.title: This peel will have you walking on air!
customer_reviews.text: I love to go barefoot, and only wear shoes in the summer if I have to. Consequently, my feet are rough and calloused. I love this foot peel! My feet haven’t been this soft in years! It took several days to start peeling, so I thought it wasn’t going to work. But once it started peeling, it went pretty fast. I didn’t soak my feet every day as recommended, and think if I had, the peel would have worked faster. I definitely recommend this peel, and look forward to using the second one!
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Barber

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Had my doubts when I first ordered it but these really work. I get bad calluses from having to work and stand on my feet so much. Prior to finding these the only way I could get rid of them was by shaving them off and sometimes that was painful. These take all the dead skin and calluses right off and leave your feet super soft for a long time. Plus, they smell great!
customer_reviews.author: destiny sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Amazeballs
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap this stuff actually works! My feet are already very soft so I didn’t think this would do much but wow.. I followed the instructions and exactly a week later is when the peeling started, amazing. Full disclosure I work 8 hours on my feet and the day after I wore the booties my feet felt extremely uncomfortable, I would recommend you do this when you know you won’t be on your feet that much
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Dry cracked feet and no peeling action
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten other brands that have worked but this one didnt do it for me, feet just looked like a cracked desert. It has been 7 days and I've soaked my feet in warm water for 15 - 20 mins everyday and it still isn't peeling like it should. My daughter and husband did it with me and no peeling for them either, we just all have very dry feet. This version did not work for us, pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lexboogie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I just finally got around to using this and I’m pretty disappointed. It smells better than baby foot but the booties are definitely not as nice and not as easy to wear. It’s messy and I did it over a week ago and my feet barely peeled ever though I soak them every night in the bath. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I was misleaded by the ad and decided to buy this product. I thought it would make my feet smooth and clean but I was wrong. It does peel on the 5th day, and it keeping going for about 2 weeks which make my feet pain and mess everywhere. I suffered for weeks and finally I don't think my feet getting better. Only made my feet more sensitive and uncomfortable. Does not like creams which made much better result.
customer_reviews.author: Folshunna Grace

customer_reviews.title: Definitley works— skin peels in a couple days
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works— after a few days, my skin started peeling and revealed fresh feet! Only complaint is the bags you put your feet into weren’t as secure as I would like, so I felt I had to be careful while wearing them not to let any solution spill out.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: No more callus!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands feet are pretty ruff being that he’s outside in different types of weather wearing steel toe boots. He had two bad callus he could not get rid of even after going to get a couple of pedicures. This is week 1 and so much dead skin has peeled it unbelievable to us both, but the callus some what remains on the right foot so the package states to retry again in week. Overall he says he’s lost lots of skin and a lot of pain. He loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A

customer_reviews.title: Takes a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well, but it wasn’t as quick of a process as the advertisements would have you believe. You need to allow an hour for the initial application, then 15-20 minute each day to soak your feet. The peels starts after a few days but takes a couple of weeks to finish. The end results were great, but the process took a long time and you need to wear socks 24/7 while the process happens.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT AT ALL! I have purchased exfoliating feet masks before. I have a brand I've always used in the past and and loved them. Great results. These were recommended by a friend, so I thought I'd give them a try. I should not have. First of all the booties are too short. They barely go past my feet up to my ankle. There was one piece of tape included to keep both on my feet. While on, they leaked profusely, emptying half the product. It's been over a week and no peeling. WILL NOT BUY AGAIN!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tootsie

customer_reviews.title: Starting to Peel
customer_reviews.text: I used the competitor foot peel mask about a year ago, and liked the result, but that brand is a little expensive, so I was pleased to see this product, I used it on Saturday and yesterday (Wednesday) I started some peeling around my toes, I'm still on the fence about it, will give it a couple more days to really make up my mind. Update, it's now Friday and I'm so pleased with the results, I've started some major peeling! This product has two pairs of booties unlike the competitor who only has one, way more bang for your buck. Thank you Cosmety Soft Foot.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S

customer_reviews.title: Leaked and unuseable
customer_reviews.text: Booties leaked inside the foil packets and ate the tapes and were unuseable. These were a total waste. I’m disappointed because my daughter had gotten the same in strawberry and they were great. I was really looking forward to a good peal😩
customer_reviews.author: gizzy

customer_reviews.title: Love these because they are actually working!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a different brand just a few months back in order to ready my feet for sandal weather and they were a complete bust. I was recommended this brand from a friend and was also pleased it came with two sets which is an excellent value for the price. I just used the first pair not a week ago and my feet are now completely peeling, I have also been soaking my feet every other day in an epsom salt bath which I think has helped move things along as well. I will definitely purchase these again when it's time to prepare for sandal weather next year!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cassell

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! This isn't a weak one. I started seeing layers come off not even 20 hours later, usually it takes me about 72 hours to see anything. My cuticles are perfect my Achilles heels are super soft . The rest is very dry and on its way towards an other layer shedding. I'm in Love. The fit of the socks were the best I've had. There's two treatments per a box which makes it even more of a steal. I can't wait to see how they look in a few days after my daily foot soaks.
customer_reviews.author: GingerSnob

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to be grossed out! These things really work! I followed everyone’s advice and soaked my feet for 10 min before putting them on. Then I soaked my feet every other day. It took a full 7 days but then the dead skin REALLY came off. My feet are like silk. The only thing I’ll add is that not all the skin comes off easily. I used a wash cloth to gently rub away some of the dead stuff. I’ll also try to use these once a month during the winter because they make getting a pedicure a challenge. All in all a great purchase though!
customer_reviews.author: J Kobernik

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: My feet are sooo dry. I was a bit skeptical, but decided to try. It took about 5 days and my feet started peeling. 8 days later my feet are still peeling, but my feet (outside of the peeling issue) look sooo much better. My only warning would be that these are definitely not made for people with large feet. I wear as size 11 shoe and could barely get my feet in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: A TRUE COFFE LOVER

customer_reviews.title: Works Better than any you’ve used before! Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not love the scent but...This is the absolute best foot peel I have ever used. I’ve used a lot of the ones everybody knows about baby foot etc. And I was worried this one wasn’t working because I didn’t have any peeling until about five days after using it but once it started it was the best most intense exfoliating peel that I’ve used. I most definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Heatherington

customer_reviews.title: I don't see any good value from this product
customer_reviews.text: It works but not as promised. From day 7 it start peeling, however it's not like all the skins but only parts of the skin. It made my feet ugly. I like the part peeling, but the rest won't peel even if you wait for another week. Finaly I got old and new skin mixed, and this is not what I want.
customer_reviews.author: betty b webster

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me but takes awhile to see results. Patience needed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because it was a 2 pack and a good value compared to other brands I looked at. My heel callouses were pretty bad and I wanted to make my feet ready for summer and sandal wear! I followed the directions....it does take quite awhile for skin to all slough off so patience is required, but after a few weeks my feet were noticeably smoother and heel callouses were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Julia P.

customer_reviews.title: Other brands are better
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other products that just peel and completely left my feet soft and smooth. I bought this one because it came with two and read it smelled pleasant. It didn’t smell terribly bad, but it only partially peeled after using strictly according to the instructions. It left parts of my foot just flakey and dry. Won’t puchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JoB

customer_reviews.title: Saved my feet!
customer_reviews.text: This baby works! I swear you don’t need to do anything w a pumice stone. I recommend following the instructions they give you for best results. After the first pack my feet were so smooth so I waited 2 weeks to use the second pair and it wasn’t as effective as the first time. I think that’s mainly because my feet weren’t that bad so I should have waited longer in between but I bought this in August and my feet are just starting to get a little dry. I took off one star because the top of my foot skin didn’t come off as evenly as the bottom and it was super patchy
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get the great results with this foot mask that others seemed to. I was hoping that large swathes of skin would peel off my feet. Maybe my calluses aren’t bad enough? I loved the smell of this. I had some sort of reaction though and my feet swelled up so big that I had to wear flip flops for two days. My feet have never reacted to a foot mask like that and it kinda freaked my out. I felt like the elephant man.
customer_reviews.author: Becca F.

customer_reviews.title: Peal, Baby, Peal
customer_reviews.text: The weirdest product you will recommend to everyone you know. Cracked heels? Dry, thick skin? Use this peal every six weeks or so for super soft feet. I started after a summer spent on the pool deck —- yikes, heels with deep black cracks. It took several uses and regular filing for maintenance for my feet to heal. After use, be sure to soak your feet for maximum benefits. I have it on subscribe and save. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sactomama

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it takes time...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife. She is always looking for products to soften her feet. Packaging, it comes with two applications. She tried it on at night. It had a strong odor similar to nail polish. It started to have an effect around the 4th day when her feet started to peel. It did soften her feet. However, it took around 7 days to fully peel off the "dead skin." She had to wear socks all the time to avoid making a mess with her peels. She was not a happy camper while her skin peeled. However, her feet are now soft, which is why she told me to give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Peels forever
customer_reviews.text: I would never go through this again. My heels started peeling around the third day after use. It truly is disturbing how your feet would peel. I ended up obsessively cutting off lose skin several times a day. I desperately wanted to apply lotion to the tops of my feet but didn't per the directions. They were still peeling two weeks or so after. Not worth the results, just get a pedicure.
customer_reviews.author: sdkc81

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best
customer_reviews.text: This foot mask is the real deal! I felt it was easiest to use the tape to secure it on my feet, put socks over that, and then watch some tv for a while. I soaked my feet almost every day, I did miss a few. The days I soaked there was definitely more progress, so don’t skip that step if you can help it. I’m still peeling while I type but every area that has cleared the peeling so far has been amazingly soft!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Goble

customer_reviews.title: Wow. My feet have never looked so good
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I am near speechless. Now don’t get me wrong, you have to be dedicated and prepared to suffer with ugly for for about 4-5 weeks while the skin peels off. At least that’s how long it took for the whole process for me... but in the end SO WORTH IT. I struggle with dry skin pretty bad, no matter what salve or serum I try my feet are always cracking and dry. I was very skeptical of this product but I figured what do I have to lose. After using it, my feet have never looked better. Be prepared for a long wait, but it is worth it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I used baby feet and was in love. This not as much. It took over 14 days to peel completely and I still have a little more peeing that’s relentless. Instead of peeling it off with my fingers, I’m using a Dead Sea salt scrub to remove the rest. First 6-7 days of peeling was great although there is 1 part of my foot that didn’t soften. My heels and instep are nice n soft though....doing round 2 tonight
customer_reviews.author: Tylisha

customer_reviews.title: Best Foot Peal I’ve Tried
customer_reviews.text: By far this is the best foot peel I have tried. Pictures are from one foot mask. This time I’ll being trying both a week a part as the directions state for bad calluses. My feet felt great after just one but I think I definitely should have done both so I would have had better results. It didn’t take 5-7 days for my feet to start peeling. It was more like 10-14 days. Then they peeled for something like 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Too much work for not enough results
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have tried something like this. "Baby Foot", never going to happen. I used both booties a week a apart as recommended for rough skin. My feet are just dry and peeling, but the skin isn't really coming off unless I peel it off. My feet look silly and this whole process has taken too long. When will I get the "baby feet" that I can show off this summer. I have soaked my feet as recommended almost every night but even that is a huge pain. I won't purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Draper

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions perfectly, but after 10 days, there was no peeling or dead skin, my feet were just PARCHED! Like, they were in THE WORST shape I'd ever seen and I'd been on a solid monthly pedicure rotation. Just awful! My daughter did the second one and her feet SORT OF peeled a few days later, but NOTHING magical AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: ss80401

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my feet. Waste!!
customer_reviews.text: My feet weren’t very bad prior to getting this, but with covid and not being able to make it to the nail salon I figured I’d give it a try. It didn’t have the peeling impact I thought it would considering I soaked my feet like recommended. Since buying and using my feet have huge cracks that won’t heal and make it hard to walk on.
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne starr

customer_reviews.title: Coolest science experiment ever
customer_reviews.text: I’m not including images because my feet have already peeled but this mask WORKS. I had my doubts, but I only did sixty minutes in the booties and still got great results in a week. A second round is definitely needed for those with hard calluses and such but I am so happy I found these and will be purchasing them again!
customer_reviews.author: Waldo47

customer_reviews.title: Very discouraged no long have trust
customer_reviews.text: I am very dissappointed with this product. I ordered this for a close friend to do the mask with and as soon as i place mine and my friends on i smell alcohol. My friend is not allowed to use any alcohol product rinse etc. The problem i have is on amazon it is not displayed that there is alcohol in the product but on the product box it states there is alcohol! Thankgod we took them off in a enough time my friend could have went to jail with his alcohol monitor. Autumn
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: It works! You don't want to see it, though...
customer_reviews.text: Better than Baby Foot! I was so surprised to find my feet peeling less than 24 hours after I applied the booties. I'm trying to get a head start on sandal season and am very impressed with the results. I'm not going to post a picture because no one needs to see that! :D
customer_reviews.author: SPC

customer_reviews.title: Got exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a foot peel a year ago and it didn’t work - so I was hesitant to get this one. Crossed my fingers and went for it. You guys?! Hahaha. This stuff is no joke. It smells absolutely delightful and you will definitely shed your feet skin like a snake. I’m going to make this a monthly thing! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Buy this to become a lizard person
customer_reviews.text: Took all the skin off the bottoms of my feet. Didn’t use any lotion (like it said to) but it didn’t get hard and flaky. But that could have been because of my swamp foot. Works as expected. Smells off though-like a college kid spilled their jungle juice on my socks kind of way. But I only smell it for the hour I have it on my feet and then it’s done so who cares.
customer_reviews.author: srg

customer_reviews.title: Ugly feet meets Baby feet
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know what to think of this peel.. but 7 days later.. BOOM . My feet are peeling! I have baby feet!! Happy about this purchase! I did soak feet every day for 20 minutes to get the desired effect.
customer_reviews.author: Pam M.

customer_reviews.title: Proper MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I genuinely rarely review anything but oh my GOSH. It’s been less than 48 and my skin is flying off. (this says a lot as to the condition my skin was in. needed lots of TLC) but now they are seeing the light. I read many reviews saying it took up to a week but literally less than 48 hours the skin the flying off. I followed the instructions exactly. Soaked before, put mask on about 75 minutes, soaked last night and after that soak, my felt so insanely dry I thought I was going mad. VOILA this evening I took my socks off and it was pure magic. Soaking for the second night as we speak!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline K

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Ok at first I thought this didn’t work at all But it really does take a couple of days to really start peeling. I love it! My feet have not been this soft in FOREVER. It does peel your entire foot and I like that. I am going to buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Big mess everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Buy the original-Baby Foot! When I opened the inner package of the first pair, there was a leak in one or both bag(s). There was not much liquid in either bag, and it was dripping out. This bother me a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Rogers B. Justin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool! Works great
customer_reviews.text: This was cool! Super simple product that works great. The peeling process was fun to watch (if you’re gross like me and enjoy that sort of thing ) and it made my feet so soft! I needed this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: L. Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other foot masks in the past and this is by far the best. THE BEST. I have terrible dry skin and the calluses on the bottom of my feet crack and bleed (gross, I know). I took the advice of another reviewer and soaked my feet for about 30 minutes before putting on the mask. A few days later the thick calluses peeled right off. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work!
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work at all! Very disappointed. I will never buy again. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Messick

customer_reviews.title: Smells and works great
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant due to the price (and for two!) but this peel definitely did its job. Make sure to stay still while you wait for 90 minutes with the peel on or else it will spill out (I tried to multitask and it was a mess). It's also important to follow the directions and soak your feet each day for it to really work. I couldn't believe how much skin peels off my feet and how much smoother they are now!
customer_reviews.author: colleesi

customer_reviews.title: Does its job, product works
customer_reviews.text: the peach smell is kinda discomforting for me. But this product does its job. I have always had soft baby like feet till i got pregnant lol I left it on for an hour and a half then rinsed it off. With in 2-3 days my feet began to peel. It has now been two weeks and its still doing its job. My feet look better already.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Dead skin
customer_reviews.text: First off all I can say is omg. I followed the directions on the box. My feet has been peeling like snake skin. It took about 5 days to notice any sign of peeling. Once it began I swear my entire foot has peeled. I went swimming and all I can say was I embraced. My feet looked so gross. I had skin falling off everywhere lmao. Let’s say once I saw my feet when I got out the water I did not go back in. I think the pool actually speeded up the process. I had large flakes Everywhere ... overall I am ready for round two. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Shelicia. H

customer_reviews.title: Would spend a little more on a different brand
customer_reviews.text: I liked this. It works better if you just showered and you use these for 75 minutes. But I wish the bags where you out your feet in would be high on top because product spills if you aren't careful.
customer_reviews.author: Annette G

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: I always feel like I have the worst feet ever. I usually get pedicures once a month but my feet are always dry and my heels have bad callouses. Decided to try this out. I knew my feet were bad but I was shocked at the amount of skin that came off!
customer_reviews.author: John and Brittany O.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. While others didn’t work these sure did! Had to get more for gifts as they were so impressive. Thanks for the great product for this mom of twins who can’t get her pedicures like she did post kids!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna lie, my feet were gross. I'm runner, wear heels... etc. The peel took like 6 days and lasted for about 1.5 weeks, but so worth it. Definitely only use 1 mask and save the 2nd for a much later date. It will do the trick. I also do not have sensitive skin so it did not burn or hurt me in any way like I see other comments. 100% recommend for a foot cleanse!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazinggggg!!!! This is an experience 😭. I used the product 8 days ago and I'm halfway done peeling. The parts where the dead skin has completely peeled and fallen off are extremely soft and pink. I never noticed how rough and discolored my feet were until this. I soak my feet for 20 or 30 minutes a day. I really just enjoy the relaxation. I bought them for myself and 3 family members and we all love it. I keep socks on when walking around the house, otherwise I would be leaving pieces of skin everywhere. Will definitely be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions exactly and it worked great. On day 4 my feet started to peal off and the stubborn calluses that I have had for years fell off. It was fun to watch and peel off too, gross but satisfying!
customer_reviews.author: D Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the promise!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this product - how easy it was to use and how effective the result! With time I stopped believing that a skin care product would ever rise to the promise they write on the packaging. But this rose above the promise! Baby feet, indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Popa

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: It definitely smelt like peach schnapps. One of my cats kept trying to investigate! It worked as stated but I wish the results lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product, if you can bear the smell
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product five stars, but WOW the smell is HORRIFIC. I’m not someone with a sensitive sense of smell, but this smell was so overwhelming, I don’t know if I will use this product again. The smell lingered for hours even after I washed off the product. With that said, the product does work exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: reb

customer_reviews.title: Short booties.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked good for me. My feet peeled within seven days. However, I gave it a four star due to the booties being too short. I like the booties where it covers a bit above my ankles so I could avoid spillage. Other than that, it’s good. Smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: pantao

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t expect it to work but it did!
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna lie, I was skeptical. I ALWAYS have rough and calloused feet despite any attempt to make them smooth. This worked! I gave it an extra day and followed someone else’s suggestion to soak them and the next day my feet started peeling like crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Maren L

customer_reviews.title: Sooo satisfying!
customer_reviews.text: Gross but holy cow does it work! With the first packet, I did 60 minutes and my feet did not feel that well. A month later, I kept the second packet on for 90 minutes and 3 days later, all the skin on my feet peeled off with some picking. Feet felt so soft and moist afterward
customer_reviews.author: LilysMama

customer_reviews.title: Most effective foot peel I have used so far.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried three other brands of foot peels, and they were all fairly underwhelming. These on the other hand kind of blew my mind with how effective they were and how quickly they worked. I did leave mine on for 30 minutes longer than I was supposed to because I lost track of time, but rather than seeing some sloughing here and there, the entire top layer of rough skin came off over the course of a week. These made my feet feel softer and look better than any expensive pedicure I've had. These will definitely be my go-to from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Binkbubblesbosley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Alright now this stuff works good. Maybe too good. Wife used it on her feet and loved it. Even after the peel came off a coupe days later MORE dead skin was flaking off in sheets leaving behind smooth soft tissue. It works. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: charlie warren

customer_reviews.title: Best Foot Peel EVER
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best foot peel I’ve ever done (and I’ve done a LOT of them). Feet started peeling just 1-2 days after doing the treatment, and stayed peeling for 1-1.5 weeks. My feet were probably the worst they had ever been, so I opted to do a second treatment about 2 weeks after the first, and WOW. My feet are SO SOFT. Definitely plan on buying again and doing maintenance treatments every few months. 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

product_meta.title: DERMATOLOGICALLY CERTIFIED EXFOLIATING Foot Peel Mask for Baby Soft Feet by Plantifique- 10X MORE EFFECTIVE for Calluses, Dead & Dry Skin - DEEP Cracked Heel Repair - 2 Pairs
feature_bullets: ✅ The #1 BEST SELLING FOOT PEEL MASK FOR 2 YEARS IN A ROW: Over 300,000 repeat customers around the world. The proprietary Peach Kernel and Aloe Vera extracts mix eliminate bacteria and foot odor and increase up to 4X the softness of your feet. Our dermatologists created a formula for this foot exfoliation peeling mask without harsh or aggressive chemicals, widely used by other masks, such as parabens and lanolin.

✅ UP TO 4X MORE POWERFUL AND NOURISHING THAN REGULAR FOOT MASKS: Study results show that the Peach Kernel extract regenerates skin 152% faster after peeling. Our Plantis complex effectively removes calluses and cracked feet from the deepest layers, leaving the skin softer and more nourished.

✅ DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED AND CONFIRMED FOR NO PAIN OR IRRITATION: Our 100% VEGAN foot peeling mask is certified and dermatologically tested (last certified in Q1 2020) by the German lab DERMATEST, a claim most other products cannot support. DERMATEST, an independent lab, results confirmed our socks’ ingredients do not cause pain or irritation if used properly, and are gentle enough to use on sensitive skin.

✅ UP TO 10X MORE EFFECTIVE DEEP CLEANSE FOR SMOOTHER SKIN: Tired of masks that leave your feet dry and raw? Thanks to the proprietary and powerful Plantis Complex, our foot mask removes impurities at a deeper level, and leaves your skin feeling luxuriously smooth. These socks are 2X LARGER by design to fit any foot size. And if other masks have burned your feet before, you and your skin are safe with these booties.

✅ AS SEEN ON ELLE, COSMOPOLITAN AND OTHERS: Multiple publications have recognized our peach foot mask as one of the best in 2020. Check out the stellar recommendations from DAILY MAIL, MIRROR, GLAMOUR, ELLE, and COSMOPOLITAN.
